data.title: Always Look on the Bright Side of Life: A Sortabiography by Eric Idle

data.text:
Eric Idle charms the audience in the audiobook version of his biography, Always Look on the Bright Side of Life. Read by the author himself, this light and charming biography gives readers a look inside one of the hilarious minds behind the comedy group Monty Python.

Check out Always Look on the Bright Side of Life here.
